text: Ngakube azizange zifike yini kunina izindaba zalabo ababengaphambilini kwenu izindaba zabantu bakaNowa no- A’d noThamud kanye nezalabo (abeza) ngemumva kwabo, akekho obaziyo ngaphandle kukaMvelinqangi, zafika kubona izithunywa zabo nezimpawu ezicacile ngakho-ke babuyisela izandla zabo emilonyeni yabo base bethi “ngempela thina sakuphika lokho enanithunywe nako futhi ngempela thina sisekungabazeni okukhulu kulokhu enisimemela kukona”
